item.title: ‘Robotaxi has reached a tipping point’: Baidu, Nvidia leaders see momentum as competition rises
item.description: Global tech executives in recent weeks have proclaimed the robotaxi industry is finally near an inflection point.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Nvidia, Palo Alto Networks, Oddity Tech, AMD and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Fed minutes show divide over October rate cut and cast doubt about December
item.description: While the Federal Open Market Committee approved a cut at the meeting, the path forward looks less creation.

item.title: Kraken confidentially files for IPO following $800 million raise
item.description: Kraken confidentially filed with federal regulators to go public in the U.S. after recently raising $800 million at a $20 billion valuation.

item.title: Muddy Waters Capital's Carson Block makes rare long call in Canadian miner Snowline Gold
item.description: Block expects Snowline to be acquired within the next three years.
